channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- DOPSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- DOPSoft

item.title: CVE-2023-43820|2024-08-29T19:59:03.682Z -- delta%20electronics -- dopsoft
item.description: A stack based buffer overflow exists in Delta Electronics Delta Industrial Automation DOPSoft when parsing the wLogTitlesPrevValueLen field of a DPS file. A remote, unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by enticing a user to open a specially crafted DPS file to achieve remote code execution.
